name: Quixer
detailed_description:
You won't know you needed that all your life before you try it.


Quixer is a very simple tool designed for a very simple task.

Seamlessly adjust any game's or application's volume with the press of a few keys. You can decrease, increase and mute the volume of focused or unfocused windows individually.

Long gone are the days where you need to interrupt what you are doing by either going into your game's audio settings or Windows volume mixer.

Quixer also now includes a feature that allows you to quickly change between Playback Devices. You will no longer have to go the long way around in Windows' sound boards.

Features


- Profiling
- Playback Devices Quick Switch
- Customizable Keybinds
- Volume Increase/Decrease
- Volume Mute/Unmute
- Volume Reset

short_description: Quixer is a quick and seamless volume mixer. It allows for specific application's volume to be adjusted without the hassle of having to go inside Windows volume mixer feature or any kind of settings. It works for both applications and games, and requires very little setup, if any at all.
